name: Tem areia No fundo do mar Tem areia
lyrics:
Tem areia, Tem areia
Tem areia
No fundo do mar
Tem areia

Tem areia, Tem areia
Tem areia
No fundo do mar
Tem areia

No fundo do mar tem pedra
Debaixo da pedra tem areia
Onde mora minha mãe
Minha mãe linda sereia

translations.text:
There's sand, there's sand
has sand
at the bottom of the sea
has sand

There's sand, there's sand
has sand
at the bottom of the sea
has sand

There are rocks at the bottom of the sea
Under the stone there is sand
Where does my mother live?
My beautiful mermaid mother

Homok van, homok van
homok van
a tenger fenekén
homok van

Homok van, homok van
homok van
a tenger fenekén
homok van

A tenger fenekén sziklák vannak
A kő alatt homok van
Hol lakik anyám?
Gyönyörű sellő anyám
